Get to know more about Top University, Fee Structure, No Donation, Infrastructure, Language, & Hostel.', canonical: 'https://www.mbbsadmissionsinabroad.com/mbbs-admission-in-sweden-for-indian-students', meta: { charset: 'utf-8', name: { keywords: 'MBBS Admission in Sweden' } } }; return (

MBBS in Sweden

Sweden is a country famous for affordable and quality medical education. Pursuing MBBS in Sweden universities/colleges is truly a rewarding investment of time, finance and career acquisition. Sweden is well known for the best medical universities. MBBS in Sweden has obtained an incredible position in the world because of high educational standards with modern teaching techniques and well-established infrastructure. MBBS graduates can do a licensing exam conducted in the USA which is USMLE (the United States Medical Licensing Examination) and easily get admission into residency program/postgraduate training in the United States. The local language in Sweden is Swedish but the medium of instruction in Sweden universities/colleges is English.

About Sweden

Sweden is a country situated in Northern Europe on the Scandinavian Peninsula which has total population of 9.9 million people. It is bordered by Norway, Finland, the Baltic Sea, and the Gulf of Bothnia. It has thousands of lakes, streams, mountains & rolling hills. The climate in Sweden is temperate & suitable for the students coming from different countries. The winter season is severe with temperatures going below -30°C and the summer temperature is +20°C.

Why Study MBBS in Sweden

MBBS in Sweden for Indian Students is the best option because of the following reasons:

  • Travel to the Sweden is much easier and even economical than traveling to other countries.
  • A medical program provided by the Sweden to their students is recognized worldwide.
  • The medium of instruction is English in Sweden colleges and universities.
  • Most of the Sweden colleges and universities are approved by MCI (Medical Council of India).
  • The students who have passed MBBS from the Sweden can also practice in India.
  • Advanced teaching techniques with outstanding facilities equipped with the well-established infrastructure
  • The students can also have the option to start working on preparation for the United States Medical Licensing Examination (USMLE) to study Post Graduate Degrees.
  • Sweden is extremely safe for Indian students and the environment is also safe.
  • There is no donation or capitation fee required in Sweden colleges and universities.
  • Sweden MBBS colleges provide the best education at affordable rates.
  • The cost of living is quite favorable for Indian students as there are excellent boarding and lodging provided by the university with the availability of Indian food for the students.

Benefits of Studying MBBS in Sweden for Indian Students 2020

Sweden is the best place for Indian students to study MBBS because of the following reasons:

  • It is easy to get MBBS Admission in Sweden because of the simple procedure for Indian students.
  • After completing MBBS in Sweden, students will get the best placement in the renowned college of India.
  • Sweden is safe for Indian students and they get everything for their survival.
  • The students can fulfill their dream of studying MBBS in Sweden with the minimum expense.
  • The local language of Sweden is Finnish but the whole MBBS course is conducted in the English language.
  • Modern teaching techniques with outstanding facilities equipped with the well-established infrastructure
  • There is no requirement of any entrance exam, and donation, & capitation fees to take MBBS admission in Sweden.

Eligibility Criteria for MBBS in Sweden

The eligibility criteria of the students who want to pursue MBBS in Sweden are as follows:

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Sweden Medical College/ Universities.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Sweden.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students must not be more than 25 years of age.

Top Universities to Study MBBS in Sweden

  • University of Helsinki
  • Aalto University
  • Tampere University
  • University of Oulu
  • University of Turku
  • University of Eastern Sweden
  • LUT University
  • University of Jyväskylä
  • Abo Akademi University
  • Lappeenranta University of Technology

Requirements for MBBS Admission in Sweden 2020-2021

The necessary documents for taking MBBS Admission in Sweden are the following:

  • A complete filled application form with all accurate details.
  • Original and photocopies of Passport.
  • Birth certificates and other mandatory certificates must be submitted to the concerned authority.
  • Passport size (3cmX4cm) photographs.
  • Original and a photocopy of mark sheets of both 10th & 12th standard
  • A scorecard of NEFT (if required)
  • Transfer certificate from the previous school
  • Leaving certificate from the concerned school
  • A certificate of code of conduct must be submitted
  • The bank copy of guardians must be submitted which indicates that they have sufficient funds to pay the fees to Sweden Medical College.
  • A medical checkup certificate is also essential

MBBS Fees in Sweden 2020-2021

The fees structure for the Indian students studying MBBS in Sweden will range from 6000 Euros to 18000 Euros per year.

MBBS in Sweden Advice for Indian Students

The following are the advices for the Indian students in Sweden:

  • The students should always be cautious of their surroundings.
  • The Indian Students are advised to apply in the Sweden Medical College within the time
  • They must avoid the company of dangerous people.
  • They should not stay outside late in the night.

Pros and Cons of Studying MBBS in Sweden

Every country has its pros and cons that can benefit as well as effect Indian students who seek admission to Sweden Medical Colleges/universities. But Sweden has more benefits as compared to other countries with very fewer cons:

The Indian students will get to experience the knowledge and the understanding of different cultures and traditions followed by the people of Sweden. The medical degrees awarded to students are recognized by WHO and MCI which enables them to work practically anywhere in the world. MCI approved Sweden Medical Universities provide hostels to the Indian students for accommodation with Indian food.

The climate conditions in Sweden often become problematic for some students to adjust well. The local language in Sweden is Finnish so the students might feel the language as a barrier outside the university campus. But the coaching in Sweden Medical College or Universities is conducted in English.

VISA Procedure for MBBS in Sweden

The students need to fill up the online application form with the right details all the required documents. The students then will receive offer letter from the university that they have applied to study MBBS in Sweden. They need to pay the MBBS in Sweden fees and then they have to apply for the visa and once they receive the student VISA card, they can book the tickets!

FAQ's to Study MBBS in Sweden
Which university is the best option to study MBBS in Sweden for Indian Students?

Most of the Sweden Medical College provides the best quality of education. The best Sweden Medical College for Indian Students is as follows:

  1. University of Helsinki
  2. Aalto University
  3. Tampere University
  4. University of Oulu
  5. University of Turku

 Is an MBBS in Sweden a Good Option?

MBBS in Sweden is an extremely valued medical degree with the best medical universities. It provides more diversity and an excellent opportunity for Indian students.

 How it is beneficial to study MBBS in Sweden for Indian students?

The students who pursue MBBS in Sweden can easily get Indian food in hostels which makes them comfortable in adjusting to this country. MBBS in Sweden is recognized worldwide as the Sweden Medical Colleges are acknowledged by WHO and MCI.

 Can a medical student study MBBS in Sweden at affordable fee structure?

Sweden Medical College charges reasonable tuition fees from international students. So, it is quite worthy & cost-effective for Indian students to study MBBS in Sweden.

 What are the admission requirements for an MBBS in Sweden?

  • The students should have science in their 12th standard and should have an aggregate of 50% marks in physics, chemistry, and Biology.
  • The students should be at least 17 years of age to take admission to Sweden Medical College/ Universities.
  • The students should also qualify for the NEET exam with passing marks to apply for MBBS in Sweden.
  • The students should have English subject in their higher secondary.
  • The students must not be more than 25 years of age.

 What is the NEET minimum marks to join an MBBS in Sweden 2020?

The NEET minimum marks to join an MBBS in Sweden 2020 is 50 percentile.

Testimonials
